snippet: Immigration officials said Jose Antonio Vargas, who was stopped on a Minnesota highway, did not present a risk to public safety.
abstract: Immigration and Customs Enforcement agency releases Jose Antonio Vargas, prominent immigrant rights advocate who was arrested in Minnesota on a traffic violation; officials say he does not present a risk to public safety.
lead_paragraph: Immigration officials said Jose Antonio Vargas, who was stopped on a Minnesota highway, did not present a risk to public safety.

headline.seo: No Immigration Charges Filed Against Jose Antonio Vargas in Traffic Stop
headline.main: No Immigration Charges Filed Against Activist in Traffic Stop
headline.print_headline: No Immigration Charges Filed Against Activist in Traffic Stop
